coded_answer.p: I'm so happy to help you forwith this international student conference. I'm afraid forsorry to hear about Richard. Could you please tellgive him my best wishes offor his health? I'm sure that you can perfectly replace ithim to lead your group.

At firstFirst, you should know that you are booked into the Palace Hotel, that is one of the best in the town. The access to the conference place is very easy. First of all, you must walk down to the Central Street until you arrive at the bus stop, then you take the bus number twonumber two bus that goes directly to the college.

After the conference, there is a great party that is organisedbeing organised by friends. It starts at twentyeight o'clock until the end of the night, so be readyprepared! There is no special thematheme for the wearing styledress code but it shouldwould be more fun if you wear something crazy...
Finally, I proposesuggest you to gogo to the new college swimmingpoolswimming pool on the last day in the afternoon. Every bodyEverybody will go there. I hope you will have fun!

I will give you some informationsinformation on the yverdon'sYverdon's castle. This building is one of the oldest that staysis in the landscape of the town. I think itsit's important to see it when you come therehere because it shows us how the town had been developpeddevelopedhas been developed around it since its creation.

ThoseThese days, the castle is being remade, so there is a lot of construction enginesmachinery around it. That's not a big problem because there is a complete museum ininside it where you can see old pictures of the castle duringover the centuries. There isare a lot of old items that were in the King's family.

You shouldwould have probably heard about the mummy who sleepshas slept there for about two thousand years... You can see it in the dungeon. So you can visit everywhere you want with or without a guide. I hope you will enjoy the visit and I wish you a nice hollidayholiday in Yverdon.
